verses.name: 1 Timothy 3:11
verses.text: Even so must their wives be grave, not slanderers, sober, faithful in all things.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 3:12
verses.text: Let the deacons be the husbands of one wife, ruling their children and their own houses well.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 3:13
verses.text: For they that have used the office of a deacon well purchase to themselves a good degree, and great boldness in the faith which is in Christ Jesus.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 3:14
verses.text: These things write I unto thee, hoping to come unto thee shortly:
